643010.name: Darknet - Soundtrack
643010.description:
Original Soundtrack for Darknet by Dormilón.

About the Artist


Dormilón is Alfredo Barraza, a Mexican-American Chicago-born audio artist currently residing in Los Angeles.

His body of work spans from live p.a. dance sets to downtempo audio collages to composition for visual media.

The majority of his work is produced and performed using Ableton Live, Korg DS-10, and Audiotool.
